plot: Riker awakens sixteen years after an away mission where he contracted a disease which destroyed his memory back to the point of infection - or so he's told.

As the Enterprise conducts a security sweep near the Neutral Zone, Picard thinks there may be a secret Romulan base and pulls Riker from his birthday party to lead an away team. When they're overcome by methane gas, Riker awakens in Dr. Crusher's sick bay and is told there have been 16 years since the incident, and that he is captain of Enterprise.—garykmcd

The last thing Commander Riker remembers was the transporter having problems locking onto his away team when they were investigating what seemed like the possibility of a secret Romulan base. The next thing he's awoken iin sickbay, as captain of the Enterprise -- sixteen years later.—Moviedude1
